fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Youth, Public Health, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: GBPR - We have recently enlisted efforts to improve broadband data privacy regulations in the United States. The European Union is far ahead of the US in protecting consumers privacy online, and we're hoping to consult with members of parliament on best practices.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Common Sense is the nation's leading nonprofit organization dedicated to improving the lives of kids and families by providing the trustworthy information, education, and independent voice they need to thrive in the 21st century.
